result.eng: I presented a paper at the conference.

result.eng: I saw your announcement in the newspaper and I am interested in the position.
result.ga: Chonaic mé d'fhógra sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost
result.orig: Chonaic mé d'fhógra sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost

result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé d'ḟógra sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpostI saw your announcement in the newspaper and I am interested in the position.

result.eng: I saw the announcement that you had in the paper and I am interested in the position.
result.ga: Chonaic mé an fógra a bhí agaibh sa bpáipéar agus tá suim agam sa bpost

result.eng: Don't forget the newspaper that we usually have each day.
result.ga: Ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéar mar a bhíonn againn gach lá

result.html: Ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéarDon't forget the newspaper.
result.ponchtml: Ná déan dearmad ar an bpáipéarDon't forget the newspaper.

result.eng: I kept that pile of papers in the corner of my table.
result.ga: Choinnigh mé an ceap páipéir sin ar chúinne an bhoird

result.eng: He dropped a newspaper on the table.
result.ga: D'fhág sé páipéar nuachta as a láimh ar an tábla
